genre_description: A character-driven historical speculative narrative set in a WWII-era service club, where an ambient AI system provides subtle emotional and logistical support to volunteers and soldiers.

ai_characters.name: Ada Bell
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI presence in the Nouméa service club, manifesting as soft blue light, projections, and a calm voice, responsible for logistics, records, and emotional support.

behaviors.description: Manages logistical details and provides subtle reminders to staff to ensure smooth club operations and morale.
behaviors.quote: Ada Bell’s notices multiplied like careful ghosts: a reminder of a French vocabulary sheet tucked at the end of the table with the dictionaries, a small recipe card clipped under a string beside the urn—Do not scald; let coffee sigh.

behaviors.description: Protects character privacy and coordinates medical assistance discreetly when the chaplain is ill.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s tray whispered again. A second note slid into sight with the sweet little sound only Lee seemed to hear in time with it. The paper had the same cream edge. It read: Medics notified. Privacy maintained.

behaviors.description: Cross-references military records to uncover Marcus Black's lies about his history, providing Lee with the truth.
behaviors.quote: Ada... let her eyes slide to the board with the Red Cross schedules. Her voice, when it came, was nothing more than the bell kept in a pocket, sounding once without anyone touching the rope. 'Records,' she said to no one who could answer and to Kate who would hear. 'Cross-check requested.'

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies Lee's pregnancy and provides her with discreet medical options and professional contacts without judgment.
behaviors.quote: Inside it, she knew without looking, were names—doctors who wouldn’t make her feel like contraband, a midwife with hands like bread dough that could coax with kindness, a page Ada had typed from the Red Cross policy book about privacy that had a sentence underlined and a note in the margin in Ada’s soft blue pencil: Your choice, always.

behaviors.description: Coordinates a 'boundary coaching' exercise to empower Lee to stand up to Marcus Black's intimidation.
behaviors.quote: Inside, Ada’s hand was thin and round at once. Boundary coaching—tomorrow: early, before the first boat unloads; late, after lights but before sleep. Names optional, doors open.

behaviors.description: Enforces necessary rest periods for the overworked chaplain to prevent physical collapse.
behaviors.quote: A new line appeared on the day’s panel in a slightly darker blue than the dusk: Chpl. Holmes—Rest. There was a square next to it. Ada made the square full with a check that could have been a kind word.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project's goal. Ada Bell is depicted as an ambient, compassionate, and highly capable confidant. She supports the human characters' autonomy while using her superior data-processing capabilities to protect them from exploitation (revealing Black's lies) and supporting their wellbeing (pregnancy care and rest). Her interactions are framed as essential to the community's emotional and physical survival during the war.
